actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that a special council be appointed and given a charter of independence to conduct an inquiry into efforts by foreign governments to influence Members of Congress.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of the House of Representatives that the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct or any other specified committee shall appoint a special counsel and establish a charter of independence for such counsel to conduct an inquiry into efforts by foreign governments to influence Members of the House.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that a special council be appointed and given a charter of independence to conduct an inquiry into efforts by foreign governments to influence Members of Congress.
